short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically limits media on all tabs unless toggled off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Media Limiter blocks images and videos on websites with a simple toggle. Enhance focus, reduce distractions, and browse more efficiently. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone seeking a cleaner web experience. Boost productivity by limiting visual media across all web pages.
